Allow cpu & memory limits and requests to be generated in kubernetes deployment

nodes.bodyText: Why don't we use the upstream decorators?

commit.message:
Kubernetes Container Resources Management

Allow cpu & memory limits and requests to be generated in kubernetes deployment

Fix: #12398

Signed-off-by: Vincent Sourtin <sourin-v@bridgestone-bae.com>
